features: Helps to Heal and Protect: This Eucerin lotion for dry skin helps to heal and protect extremely dry, sensitive and compromised skin
Fragrance Free: Eucerin Original Healing fragrance free body lotion is also dye free, and is safe for use as a daily moisturizing lotion
Replenish Skin's Moisture Barrier: This Eucerin sensitive skin lotion helps to prevent moisture loss by replenishing the skin’s moisture barrier
Convenient Lotion Pump Bottle: Eucerin body lotion pump bottle is perfect for storage at home or in the office
Includes one (1) 16.9 fluid ounce pump bottle of Eucerin Original Healing Lotion
body.description: Eucerin Original Healing Lotion is a time-tested formula that helps heal and protect extremely dry, sensitive and compromised skin. The thick, rich body lotion for dry skin formula provides intensive moisture for dry skin. Eucerin Original Healing Lotion binds water to the skin to provide effective moisturization, and this unscented body lotion helps prevent moisture loss by replenishing the skin’s moisture barrier. This non-comedogenic lotion for sensitive dry skin is fragrance free and dye free, and is gentle enough for use as a daily body lotion. This body moisturizer is perfect as a lotion for very dry skin, and can also be used as a hand lotion or foot lotion. To use, smooth this Eucerin dry skin lotion onto your skin daily. For best results, apply after showering. Eucerin is a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand that is based on an uncompromising approach to science. With skin care products designed to restore and sustain healthy-looking skin, families everywhere look to Eucerin to enhance outer beauty and self-confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Can you use this product on your face? The Eucerin Original Healing Lotion may be used on the face as well as the body as it does not clog pores. Please avoid the eyes. What ingredients are in this Lotion? You can find a full list of the ingredients in Eucerin Original Healing Lotion on the back of the bottle and in the product images located at the top of this page. Is this lotion alcohol free? There are no drying alcohol ingredients in the Eucerin Original Healing Lotion. Will this product increase the chances of getting a sunburn? There is no increased chance of getting a sunburn with use of The Eucerin Original Healing Lotion. It does not contain sunscreen protection, however, sunscreen may be applied over the lotion after 10-15 minutes. Does this product come in a larger size? Yes, the Eucerin Original Healing Lotion is offered in a 13.5 fl oz size and is offered in a body cream for a slightly thicker, richer texture. Eucerin Original Healing Cream comes in a 16 oz jar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizer, perfect for sensitive skin, no sent, works on my face!
reviews.reviewText: I have pretty sensitive facial skin so I can't use anything with fragrance. It just gets red if I apply any lotion that has added scent. This lotion is solid, it is thick but absorbs fairly quickly. I would not use this 5 minutes before you head out to work, since it does take a bit of time to absorb into the skin. I use it at night before I go to sleep. If necessary, I'll add a SMALL dab to my face before heading out. When I wake up after applying the lotion the night before, my face feels hydrated. It has been at least two weeks or longer since I started to apply this lotion... so far it has healed my red dry skin. I may have to wait to test it during the dry winter, but we shall see. I do not see any problems using product. I have already covered my entire face with this thick lotion and felt no pain as I would with many other brand that may contain fragrances. The only products that I have been able to use is Cetaphil (ONLY the "body" cream) and Aquaphor. Cetaphil body cream is kind of light, so it absorbs quickly. When I wake up in the mornings I can tell the Cetaphil doesn't really keep moisture long periods of time. Aquaphor is mineral based petroleum, kind of super-oily. So one moisturizes too short term, while the other kind of keeps your face too oily. This Eucerin Original Healing Lotion kind of fits in between. Highly recommend Eucerin Original Healing Lotion or the cream version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Like it very much. Very pleasant feeling. Looking forward to buy more in the future. Great quality and easy to use. Highly recommended. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I deal with a few different skin issues and have most of my life, I found this and now I won't buy anything else, it has outperformed some of my prescription lotions, that speaks volumes about this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love this lotion, but the pump leaks ...
reviews.reviewText: I've been buying Eucerin Original Healing Rich Body Lotion for a few years now and I love it. I particularly enjoy the fact that it doesn't have a noticeable scent and it doesn't irritate my rather sensitive skin.The past two bottles I've ordered from Amazon, however, have pumps that leak. It doesn't start immediately, but after a couple of weeks (even when not in use), lotion builds up around the base of the pump and oozes down the side of the bottle. These were ordered some months apart, so the problem clearly has not been fixed. Not planning to switch brands any time soon, but it still should be noted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this cream
reviews.reviewText: Some of my patients had this cream prescribed to them for their legs. As a nurse, I always apply these types of things with gloves but it always went on so smooth. I wanted to try some for my self. I will never go back to normal lotion. It makes your skin so soft and shiny with moisture. I use this atleast once or twice a week along with other lotion in between the days I don’t use this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon had it when the store was out
reviews.reviewText: My wife can’t live without this stuff, and when the local store was out, I said, “Let me check Amazon…” Sure enough, I found it here, it was cheaper than the store, and was delivered the next day for free. Soft skin and a good deal…can’t do much better than that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dry feet
reviews.reviewText: I've tried other lotions for my dry and cracked feet, this one is easily the best. It's so oily it oozes from unseen pores in the bottle and leaves a puddle underneath. A bit messy but worth it.
Buen producto, el mismo que se consigue en us

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 31, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: Best body lotion for severe dry skin
reviews.reviewText: Brilliant body lotion for people with severely dry skin. Eucerin is the only product both myself and my daughter with excema can use and it provides relief to the dry feeling and is an excellent moisturiser.
Usada en persona que había estado en cama y que estaba teniendo problemas de irritación en la piel y resequedad, la crema ha hecho lo que promete.
